item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - Cyberpunk: Edgerunners [HEVC x265 | Dolby Vision 8.1 + HDR10 | JAP/ENG DDP 5.1]
item.description:
Synopsis:
David, a street kid, tries to survive in Night City, a dystopian city as violent and corrugated as addicted to genetic modification. To stay alive, the teenager becomes a mercenary known as Cyberpunk.

PS: The orginal DV rip was Profile 5 and converted into 8.1 in order to extend the compatibility on more screens.

Cyberpunk.Edgerunners.S01.1080p.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.DV8.HDR.x265-SonMaxime
